meanings.definition: The act of adjusting or making changes to something in order to improve or correct it.
meanings.sent1: After the mistake, the teacher made quick readjustments to the lesson plan.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic made readjustments to the engine to fix the problem.
meanings.sent3: The readjustments to the recipe turned the cake into a savory surprise.
meanings.sent4: His readjustments to his daily routine made him more productive.
meanings.sent5: The readjustments to the painting transformed it into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The process of making small changes or corrections to something in order to make it more accurate or effective.
meanings.sent1: The readjustments to the budget helped save money for the project.
meanings.sent2: Regular readjustments to the telescope ensured clear observations.
meanings.sent3: The readjustments to the clock made it tick backwards for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her readjustments to the essay improved its clarity and flow.
meanings.sent5: The readjustments to the design enhanced its functionality.
